name: MyWorkDrive Client Shortcut File
summary: Learn about .MWD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: MWD files can be opened in Windows by double-clicking them. However, the MyWorkDrive Mapped Drive client must be installed and set as the default program for opening the MWD files. When you double-click the MWD file, the folder or file linked in the file will open in the MyWorkDrive Mapped Drive Client.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
